ExpSyntax.val: 'RP07_ How Do I Include All Data from a Multi-Line Control in My Report?'

_Comment.valUnicode:
This form will expand because:
1. In Form properties, Expand form is set to One page. 2. The Table control that holds the text blob is set to Fix size table = No. 3. The Edit Control is set to Multi-Line edit.

ExpSyntax.val: 'Rich Internet Applications (RIAs) are web applications that have many of the characteristics of desktop applications, typically delivered either by way of a site-specific browser, via a browser plug-in, or independently sandboxes or virtual machines.[1] Adobe Flash, Java and Microsoft Silverlight are currently the three top platforms, with penetration rates around 99%, 80% and 45% respectively.[2] Although new web standards have emerged, they still use the principles behind RIAs'
